name: Uthel's World
description:
Controls

WASD, Arrow keys, or Left click on a viewport to Move / Attack.

Space or Right click to Rest and recover some HP/MP

Left mouse for everything else!

This game was made for the 2023 7DRL Game Jam!

Uthel's World is a tribute to Moraff's World from 1991.

Your goal is to descend as deep into the dungeon as you possibly can, encountering progressively more difficult and dangerous enemies and bosses.

Will the RNG dieties be on your side?

Version 05 is the 7DRL jam submission version (available as download).

 Version 06 includes a fix for a game breaking bug.

Hope you enjoy!

Most of the sound effects are from Nicole Marie T's lovely 8-bit sound effect pack.

https://nicolemariet.itch.io/20-8-bit-chiptune-sfx-jingles
